translation: “Making Ram a sage, turn him out of the home;”221.
(The poet says) She was stubborn like a child and verged on madness.
She did not keep silent and was continuously speaking.222.
She was worthy of reproach and store of man acts.
She was evil-tongued queen and the cause of weakening the strength of the king.223.
She got the ouster of Ram, who was the pillar (support) of the house;
And in this way she performed the evil act of killing her husband.224.

gurmukhi: ਅਜਿੱਤ ਜਿੱਤੇ ਅਬਾਹ ਬਾਹੇ ॥ ਅਖੰਡ ਖੰਡੇ ਅਦਾਹ ਦਾਹੇ ॥
transliteration: Ajitt Jitte Abaah Baahe|| Akhannddkhande Adaah Daahe||
translation: (The poet says that the woman) conquered the unconquered, destroyed the indestructible, broke the unbreakable and (with her blaze) reduced to ashes the indeclinable.

gurmukhi: ਅਭੰਡ ਭੰਡੇ ਅਡੰਗ ਡੰਗੇ ॥ ਅਮੁੰਨ ਮੁੰਨੇ ਅਭੰਗ ਭੰਗੇ ॥੨੨੫॥
transliteration: Abhand Bhande Adan Dane|| Amounnd Mounnde Abhan Bhane||225||
translation: She has slandered him who cannot be calumniated, she has given him a blow who cannot be farmed. She has deceived them who is beyond deception and has disjointed the compact one.225.

gurmukhi: ਅਕਰਮ ਕਰਮੰ ਅਲੱਖ ਲੱਖੇ ॥ ਅਡੰਡ ਡੰਡੇ ਅਭੱਖ ਭੱਖੇ ॥
transliteration: Akaram Karamannd Alakkh Lakkhe|| Adand Dande Abhakkh Bhakkhe||
translation: She has engrossed the detached one in action and her vision is so sharp that she can see providence. She can cause the unpunishable to be punished and uneatable to be eaten.

gurmukhi: ਅਥਾਹ ਥਾਹੇ ਅਦਾਹ ਦਾਹੇ ॥ ਅਭੰਗ ਭੰਗੇ ਅਬਾਹ ਬਾਹੇ ॥੨੨੬॥
transliteration: Athaah Thaahe Adaah Daahe|| Abhan Bhane Abaah Baahe||226||
translation: She has fathomed the unfathomable and has destroyed the indestructible. She has destroyed the indestructible and has moved the immovable as her vehicles.226.

gurmukhi: ਅਭਿੱਜ ਭਿੱਜੇ ਅਜਾਲ ਜਾਲੇ ॥ ਅਖਾਪ ਖਾਪੇ ਅਚਾਲ ਚਾਲੇ ॥
transliteration: Abhijj Bhijje Ajaal Jaale|| Akhaap Khaape Adhaal Dhaale||
translation: She has dyed the dried one, blazed the incombustible. She has destroyed the indestructible and has moved the immovable.

gurmukhi: ਅਭਿੰਨ ਭਿੰਨੇ ਅਡੰਡ ਡਾਂਡੇ ॥ ਅਕਿੱਤ ਕਿੱਤੇ ਅਮੁੰਡ ਮਾਂਡੇ ॥੨੨੭॥
transliteration: Abhinn Bhinne Adand Daande|| Akitt Kitte Amounnd Maande||227||
translation: She has disjoined the compact one and has punished the unpunishable. She can do whatever is not to be done and can corroborate the irrefutable.227.
